PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-09102020-11-20TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the VESSEL OPERATION RESTRICTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) include a maximum 7.5kW aggregate power for electric motors on vessels in waters where power-driven vessels are prohibited; (2) add the kilowatt power limit to the signage requirements; and (3) update the geographical coordinates for certain bodies of water.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0252 Publication Date: 2020-12-09
AttachmentsAttachment
